definition: Effendi, wily and fearless hero of Uighur folk tales/smart guy

prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale

sentences.english: Compare "prices" for Avanti sofa, accessories and save.
sentences.chinese: 比較研究阿凡提的沙發和配件價格和保存。

sentences.english: The language with humorous is one of the seasons that the story attains success.
sentences.chinese: 幽默詼諧的語言是阿凡提故事成功的奧祕之一。

sentences.english: Long ago there lived a man in XingJiang. His name was Arfanti. The king of his country was very bad.
sentences.chinese: 從前，新疆有個非常非常聰明的人，名字叫做阿凡提。

sentences.english: Afandi puts the cat to balance, the cat weighs 3 jins.
sentences.chinese: 阿凡提把貓放到天平上，貓重3斤。

sentences.english: Afanty borrowed a small ingot of gold from a moneybags, but repaid him two ones.
sentences.chinese: 阿凡提借了財主一錠金子，還他時給了他兩錠。

sentences.english: When I was young, I liked the puppet cartoon film Tales of Avanti very much.
sentences.chinese: 小時候，我特別喜歡看木偶片《阿凡提的故事》。

sentences.english: Kingly instantly award A every carries bullion of one Da Lian.
sentences.chinese: 國王立即賜給阿凡提一褡褳金銀。

sentences.english: Han Jia, do you think I look like Xinjiang's legendary figurer Afanti?
sentences.chinese: 韓佳，你看我像不像新疆傳奇的人物阿凡提啊？

sentences.english: I was crazy about Afanti when I was little.
sentences.chinese: 我小時候非常喜歡阿凡提。
